remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
csbied.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
csbied.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B = C ) $.
csbied $p |- ( ph -> [_ A / x ]_ B = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
